jobTitle: Director of Specification Sales - Southern CA
description:
We’ve been engaged to identify an exceptional leader who will spearhead sales strategies and illuminate the path to market leadership. We’ve been entrusted to identify a strategic, collaborative leader with vision who will not just meet but exceed expectations in driving growth and success.

The chosen candidate will take on the full-time challenge of leading business planning, account management, and sales operations. Focusing primarily on dominating the West Coast Territories in the initial two years, and moving this success east from there. This role is for those who are ready to shine brightly.

You are a visionary with a remarkable track record of success in business planning and budgeting. Your expertise in account management and sales is unmatched, and your knowledge of the architectural industry, especially in lighting solutions, will be your guiding force.
